content:
# Homepage NetCastPL4.0

URL: https://netcastpl4-0.agh.edu.pl/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:33:36

Networking for advancing excellence and capacity in light-weight castings for Foundry 4.0 in Poland                

Read more about the project

                        What is the goal?                    

                            The main aim of NetCastPL4.0 is building the international network for advanced thin-walled, high quality iron’s and aluminium alloys castings in green technology.                        

                            Project partners                        

                                    AGH University of Krakow (Poland)                                

                                    Aalto University (Finland)                                

                                    Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche (Italy)                                

                                Training & dissemination                            

Schools, visits and internships

Associations

Seminars and conferences

New scientific and industrial partners

                                Lightweighting castings                            

Foundry 4.0

Process development

Design

Material development

Green deal policy

                                    Show all                                

                Report            

                Report on research management and administration skills improvement            

                A report on setting up the Unit for research management and administration for European cooperation at AGH, as the necessity appeared stringent in the context of the complexity of EU programmes and the regular practice of big organizationsto work with professionalsin proposals preparation will be prepared. A Management convention involving the 3 partners grant offices will be organized every year for exchange best-practices.            

                    Open

                    Download

                    Share:

                Report            

                Report and plan on research and professional career enhancement            

                A report and plan on enhancement of research and professional carrier conducted by CNR and AALTO, who will support AGH to approach students in the universities related to activities in metallurgy and to present them the opportunities for graduates within AGH. The main strong points of a potential scientific career will be emphasised.              

                    Open

                    Download

                    Share:
